name: City of the Great Machine: The Confrontation
description:
The Confrontation is a Kickstarter Exclusives Pack that contains the Oracle Zeppelin and the On the Verge Modules as well as unique City Events and a secret Great Machine Enhancement in a sealed envelope.

The Oracle Zeppelin Module may be played both in the One-vs-Many and Solo & Cooperative Modes.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction
mechanics: Action Queue, Area Movement, Hidden Movement, Modular Board, Solo / Solitaire Game, Team-Based Game

name: Aventuria: Curse of Borbarad
description:
Eleven brave heroes set out to infiltrate Borabarad's tower and break its curse, but now they are all dead. All but you! As the last survivor, you must now face the dangers of the tower alone to complete the mission! Borbarads Fluch is a solo adventure for Aventuria - The Adventure Card Game.

Assemble the Archmage's cursed Mage Tower from a total of 30 tower cards and send your hero to its deadly floors. Your goal is to find out what Borbarad's curse is all about and save all of South Aventuria from a devastating catastrophe. Between you and your goal stands the mysterious tower and its guards and traps, and a single hero can only find certain death here. Fortunately, death in this wretched place, steeped in ancient magic, is only the beginning!

It allows you to learn from the mistakes of the past as you delve deeper and deeper into the tower to unlock its disturbing secrets. This adventure was deliberately designed for a single hero and contains numerous game mechanics to make the solo game entertaining and diversionary, but can also be mastered by entire groups of heroes with great fun. A large-format tower plan with four deadly floors, study cards, rules for hunger and thirst and many other game elements ensure that every new advance into the Mage Tower is exciting and challenging and you never know exactly what you will be up against next time.

—description from the publisher (translated)
categories: Adventure, Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game

name: Sea of Clouds: Kitty, Unicorn, Love Ray Promo Cards
description:
Sea of Clouds: Kitty, Unicorn, Love Ray is a set of three promotional cards for Sea of Clouds.
Simply shuffle them with the other Loot cards after setup. Whenever one of them shows up on top of the draw pile, the game is momentarily interrupted. The active player picks the card, reads it aloud and immediately applies its effects. Then, the card is discarded and the game goes on normally.
categories: Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Lords of Ragnarok: Utgard – Realms of the Giants
description:
Utgard is a land that was sometimes recognized as the world and sometimes only as a fortress located in Jotunheim. Regardless, it was a place inhabited by Ice Giants. In the game, Utgard will replace Jotunheim. With this realm, you will introduce Ice Giants to the game, which players with an alliance will be able to recruit into their armies. They will be helpful in the next battle in which your army will take part, giving you a significant bonus to strength.

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Mythology, Science Fiction
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Area Movement

name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Class Deck – Summoner
description:
Beyond Space and Time! Bonded to a mysterious creature called an eidolon, the summoner’s true power lies in what he and his eidolon can accomplish together. The Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Summoner Class Deck allows Balazar and 2 other characters, including Alase Brinz-Widowknife from the Pathfinder Tales novel "King of Chaos," to explore the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game.

This 109-card accessory holds a bevy of new spells and other goodies to take your summoner through an entire Adventure Path. This deck can also be used in the Pathfinder Society Adventure Card Guild organized play campaign.
categories: Adventure, Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting
mechanics: Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Cooperative Game, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Dice Rolling, Variable Player Powers

name: Age of Steam Expansion: The Netherlands
description:
Published in German gaming magazine Spielbox (2007, issue 2).

This is the same Netherlands expansion as was included in Winsome's Age of Steam Expansion: Austria, Switzerland & The Netherlands, except that the graphic design is more colorful. The Netherlands expansion is for 5-7 players, includes a special Goods Demand and Action Display and is printed in German. New Actions are included, specifically Liquidate, Income and Demand.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Trains
mechanics: Pick-up and Deliver, Tile Placement

name: Die Siedler von Catan: Rincewind und der Tourist  /  Die Gilden von Ankh-Morpork
description:
A pair of new scenarios for The Settlers of Catan acting in the DISCWORLD of Terry Pratchett. Not only Terry Pratchett, but also Klaus Teuber and KOSMOS agreed to the Scenario published in same quality as the last one of Österreichisches Spielemusuem Renaissance in der Steiermark/Burgbau in Chaffenberch.

In "Die Gilden von Ankh-Morpork," join the Thieves, Assassins, Beggars, or other guilds and be a part of the biggest city on Discworld: Ankh-Morpork. Seek the favor of Lord Vetenari. This scenario has you build the city, only guild members may build in the outlying towns. Place settlements near the Guild Halls. Pay resources to the Guild of Thieves to be protected from robbers. Pay an assassin to eliminate neighbors so you can take over their small shops near other guilds.

In "Rincewind und der Tourist," players have to trade resources as usual in Catan Games, but in addition they may create dragons with fantasy and magic, may travel like a tourist, or deliver resources by ship - but keep off the edge of Discworld, where your ships may be kidnapped before falling...

This is the first official Catan scenario to have both 3-4 player and 5-6 capability in the same set. It only requires the base game; all other materials are provided by the scenario.

Catan meets Discworld! Available for those who take part in the Austrian Catan Championships and during the upcoming 2008 Essen Fair at the booth of the Österreichische Spielemuseum.

This scenario is part of the Catan series.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Negotiation, Novel-based
mechanics: Trading

name: 8Bit Box: Pixoid
description:
Move around the Circuit Board using your controller. Playing as Pixoid? Try to escape the Bugs for as long as you can! Playing as a Bug? Do your best to coordinate your moves with the other Bugs to catch Pixoid as fast as possible!

Each round, Pixoid is played by a different player. Once each player has played as Pixoid, whoever has the most victory points wins.

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Video Game Theme
mechanics: Action Queue, Grid Movement, Simultaneous Action Selection

name: Awkward Guests: Kickstarter Stretch Goals Box
description:
All the exclusive Kickstarter components from the campaign into a box.

Includes:
6 new character cards
Mr Walton's letter
Mr Walton's business card
Mr Walton's Portrait
Mr Walton's bust
Inquiry standees of Mr. Walton's cats
categories: Card Game, Deduction, Expansion for Base-game, Humor, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Murder/Mystery
mechanics: Hand Management, Open Drafting, Trading

name: Defenders of the Realm: Sterling, Guardian Dragon of the Realm
description: Defenders of the Realm: Hero Expansion #6 doesn't actually include any playable heroes, but instead comes with the miniature, placard, and cards needed to call on Sterling, the three-headed silver dragon guardian of the realm, and ally to the heroes.
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Miniatures
mechanics: Action Points, Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Point to Point Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: Alubari: A Nice Cup of Tea – Promo Cards
description:
Received them at Spiel 2019 in Essen at the Studio H Booth.
4 additional equpiment cards.

The Post Train
Town Market
Chaiwala's Assistant
Chai Boiler
categories: Economic, Expansion for Base-game, Farming, Trains
mechanics: Worker Placement

name: Tamashii: Chronicle of Ascend – Catie's Diary
description:
With this expansion, we will go back several years before the action of the main storyline in order to find, get to know, and convince Catie on our side.

This expansion introduces a new body to the game, a unique scenario, special Data tokens, new tiles and a deck of Catie's Diary cards.
categories: Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Complots Deluxe
description:
Complots Deluxe is an all-in-one package containing Complots + Complots 2 + Complots : Saint Barthélemy as well as two new exclusive cards: "La Peste" (The Plague) et "Le Mendiant" (The Beggar).

A corrupt city, subject to vice and avarice, is under the control of vile characters. The seat of power is vacant and waiting for you to take it — unless someone else takes it first.

In Complots, as in the original game Coup, you control two characters and start with two coins, and through trickery, manipulation and bluffing, you want to eliminate all other players who stand in your way, possibly by having them eliminate one another along the way.
categories: Bluffing, Card Game, Deduction, Medieval, Party Game
mechanics: Memory, Player Elimination, Take That, Variable Player Powers

name: Wonder Tales: Rumplestiltskin (solo mode)
description: Here's the solo play. This has been a long requested expansion to Wonder Tales and has been working its way around for a while now. It's basically just a ruleset, but we are making it nicer with 4 cards that can stay out in play.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy
mechanics: Set Collection, Solo / Solitaire Game, Square Grid, Tile Placement

name: Star Wars: Legion – TX-225 GAVw Occupier Combat Assault Tank Unit Expansion
description:
For the Galactic Empire, conquering a planet is only the beginning of the battle. Massive vehicles like AT-STs and elite shock troops like Imperial Death Troopers may be effective at sweeping across battlefields and capturing new territory, but they rarely stick around to hold this ground. Soon, however, you'll gain a powerful tool that can help quell any opposition that might rise against Imperial occupation.

With the TX-225 GAVw Occupier Combat Assault Tank Unit Expansion, you'll find a single menacing TX-225 miniature that can work in tandem with your ground troops to impose the Empire's will wherever it's been assigned. This beautiful miniature is accompanied by the full assortment of unit cards, upgrade cards, and tokens that you'll need to add one to your Imperial armies.

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Science Fiction, Wargame
mechanics: Action Points, Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Dice Rolling, Variable Player Powers

name: D-Day Quad Deluxe
description:
The Allied invasion of Normandy was a watershed moment in the war. Months of careful planning proceeded while the entire uncommitted strength of the American, British, Canadians, and other Allied armies massed in England. Across the Channel the Germans strove mightily to create hardened defenses on the beach and back them with a slew of new and veteran divisions. The clash came in the early hours of 6 June 1944: D-Day. If the Allies failed to grab a large enough beachhead the invasion would be contained and eventually crushed. If the German lines broke, the full weight of Allied power would be loosed to drive deep into France.

The D-Day Quad uses the Fire & Movement system, designed to highlight the ability of motorized units to mass quickly for breakthrough and exploitation. Support fire, representing weapons ranging from mortars through cannon and light ground attack aircraft to heavy bombers, provides the extra punch to overwhelm a defense or shatter an attack. Winning the battle is a matter of maneuver, firepower, and asset management.

Contents:
One 34×22 inch mounted game board
400 Die-cut counters
Color rules booklet
One six-sided die
Storage bags
categories: Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid, Simulation

name: Legend of the Five Rings: The Card Game – For the Empire
description:
Take to the battlefield with For the Empire, the first Dynasty Pack in the Inheritance Cycle for Legend of the Five Rings: The Card Game!

For the Empire includes one copy of three new cards, and three copies of nineteen new cards for Legend of the Five Rings: The Card Game. This Dynasty Pack focuses on the brave Bushi who fight for their clans on battlefields strewn with blood and dirt. Furthermore, look for the introduction of the new disguised mechanic, which sees hidden iconic samurai take on the identities of unassauming non-unique characters, only to reveal their true skill and ability at the most opportune moment. All of this and for awaits you in For the Empire!

-description from the publisher's website
categories: Card Game, Collectible Components, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy
mechanics: Action Points, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Secret Unit Deployment, Variable Player Powers

name: Stuffed Fables: Lost Story #1
description:
This lost story is a stand-alone adventure for Stuffed Fables that can be inserted between chapters 3 and 4 if players are enjoying Stuffed Fables as a campaign. This exciting story sees the Stuffies battling on the streets of their town with the dreaded Dollmaker and his newest contraption!

—description from the publisher
categories: Adventure, Animals, Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Role Playing, Storytelling, Variable Player Powers
publishers: (Web published), Cube Factory of Ideas, Plaid Hat Games

name: Catan: Delmarva
description:
This map represents the combined areas of Delaware, Maryland, and Virgina, along with Washington D.C. Also printed on the map are various details about many towns in the area, and some history.

From the map:
"Delmarva" stands for "Delaware, Maryland, and Virginia." It often refers to the peninsula east of the Chesapeake Bay. Greater Delmarva includes these states, Washington DC, and West Virginia. This "mid-Atlantic" region is marked by 4 distinct geographic zones (East-West): the wetland Tidewater area, including the peninsula, the rolling lands of the Piedmont, the Blue Ridge (including the Shenandoah Valley), and the Allegheny Highlands (including the Allegheny Plateau and the parts of the Appalachia to the north and west). It is one of earth's oldest and most diverse ecosystems.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Negotiation
mechanics: Unspecified

name: When Darkness Comes: The Horror Within
description: This is the first expansion for When Darkness Comes. It focuses on the world of shape shifters and lycanthrope and features additional rules and scenarios, four additional map tiles and two additional miniatures. It also contains part two of the GM campaign.
categories: Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Horror
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Modular Board, Role Playing, Roll / Spin and Move, Tile Placement

name: Folklore: The Affliction – Folklore Shadow Pack
description:
A pack of exclusive items from Folklore: The Affliction The Fall of the Spire Expansion Kickstarter campaign. Note that this pack also requires the Dark Tales Expansion to use these cards. Items include:

x4 Artifacts Card (mini size: 48x68mm)
- Cauldron of Summoning
- Crown of Thorns
- Lich's Scepter
- Ring of Shifting

x4 Rumors Card (Poker size: 3.5x2.5in)
- Dark Tower
- Lair of the Mother
- Stains on Stones
- Witch's March

x1 World Map (Metal) Group Marker (16mm base)
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Exploration, Fantasy
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Storytelling
publishers: Greenbrier Games, Twin Fire Productions, LLC

name: Dust Tactics: Sturmgrenadiere Command Squad – "Kommandotrupp"
description:
Kommandotrupp is an expansion for Dust Tactics, the tactical miniatures board game of explosive battlefield combat! With Kommandotrupp, an Axis Sturmgrenadiere Command Squad, you’ll gain a new level of control over your Dust Tactics forces.

Kommandotrupp has the Command Squad ability, making it indispensable in overseeing your other forces. Their exceptional motivational skills even allow them to reactivate units that you’ve already used! What’s more, both squads have the Artillery Strike ability, meaning they can serve as spotters for any friendly tank armed with Artillery (as described in the Artillery rules in the Operation Cyclone Campaign Expansion)!

Kommandotrupp is a special unit of field officers whose skills are invaluable. They too are equipped with assault rifles and a machine gun, and like their Allied counterparts, their presence on the battlefield can change the entire course of battle. A wise general should take care to protect these experienced officers.

(Publisher's website)
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Science Fiction, World War II
mechanics: Action Points, Dice Rolling, Modular Board

name: Magic: The Gathering – Innistrad
description:
On Innistrad, every creature hides a darker aspect. Hedonistic vampires stalk the shadows to quench their thirst, and the full moon transforms the simple into the savage.

Innistrad features 264 black-bordered cards, including randomly inserted premium versions of cards. It’s the first set to feature double-faced Magic cards.

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Collectible Components, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting
mechanics: Hand Management

name: Dream Home: 156 Sunny Street – Game Room
description: Single promo card to 156 Sunny Street expansion. It is additional "friend" card which gives you 3 points for having Game Room adjacent to Bathroom or Kitchen in your home.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Memory, Open Drafting, Pattern Building, Set Collection
publishers: Rebel Sp. z o.o., White Goblin Games

name: Last Night on Earth 'Darkest Night' Scenario
description:
From Flying Frog's website:

Trapped and alone in the Radio Station atop Timber Peak, Samantha the DJ has broadcast for help as the Zombies close in. The only thing keeping them at bay is a thin net of arcing electrical wires she has set up surrounding the building, powered by a pair of old generators. Sputtering as their fuel runs low and the lights flicker, it is clearly only a matter of time before the generators give out. Her only hope is that someone will hear the sound of her voice before it's too late.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fighting, Horror, Print & Play, Zombies
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Modular Board, Roll / Spin and Move, Team-Based Game, Variable Player Powers

name: Viral: Rampage Mutation Promo Card
description:
Promo card for Viral that lets you do 4 things: twice an attack in the zone that you have combined with this mutation card and 2 movements.
It's worth 1 victory point at the end of the game.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Humor, Medical
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Area Movement, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Simultaneous Action Selection
publishers: Arcane Wonders, Corax Games, Edge Entertainment, Ediciones MasQueOca, MEBO Games, MESAboardgames

name: Museum: Pictura – Vernissage
description: As Museum: Pictura is set in the roaring 20’s, we wanted to bring some of the glamourous soirées of that time into the game! Vernissage does just that. In this expansion, you will be attempting to organise luxurious private parties for only the most illustrious of guests! In order to attract these Very Important Patrons, you’ll need to discard Painting cards, temporarily putting them to one side for your exclusive parties. Delight them with just the right combination of Painting cards, and you’ll convince them to lend their support to your establishment! This support will come in the form of Prestige points at the end of the game, but also other bonuses!
categories: Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Set Collection

name: Baltimore & Ohio Expansion Set
description:
The Baltimore & Ohio Expansion Set comprises four distinct expansions for Eagle Games' Baltimore & Ohio game. All four expansions may be used simultaneously or players may select any combination of expansions.


The Norfolk & Western expansion adds another railroad to the base game, the famous coal carrying N&W Railroad. This expansion includes an N&W charter, 10 N&W stocks, 10 color-coded wood cubes, 5 Coal counters and an N&W Valuation counter.
The Technology Level 7 expansion extends the historical period of the game to 1945. Five new Technology Level 7 train cards are included.
The Robber Barons expansion introduces important economic interests into the development of the railroads in America. Eight Robber Barons cards are included with this expansion; Steel Producers, Detroit Auto Manufacturers, Trans-Atlantic Shippers, Locomotive Builders and Wall Street Financiers are just some of the cards.
The Maine Lumber expansion brings the importance of the Northeastern U.S. logging industry to the game and a special counter is included with this expansion.


Each of the four stand-alone expansions may be used with the full range of players allowed in the standard Baltimore & Ohio game.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Trains, Transportation
mechanics: Pick-up and Deliver, Simulation, Stock Holding

name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game – A Harsh Mistress
description:
Game description from the publisher:

In George R.R. Martin's A Song of Ice and Fire, the knights and lords who strive to live honorably often find themselves conflicted. A Harsh Mistress, the fourth Chapter Pack in the "Beyond the Narrow Sea" cycle, carries the demands of duty in A Game of Thrones: The Card Game from the wintry North to the Free Cities of Essos.

Filled with unique locations, characters, and powerful attachments, A Harsh Mistress continues to the develop the game's focus on its unique personalities. Its sixty new cards (three copies each of twenty different cards) allow players to relive the conflicts of duty and honor, relaying commands to their characters and imposing duties upon their opponents. Unique locations, characters, and powerful attachments fill this Chapter Pack, along with two new plots that continue to the develop the game's focus on its unique personalities.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Medieval, Negotiation, Novel-based
mechanics: Hand Management, Open Drafting, Simultaneous Action Selection, Variable Player Powers
publishers: Edge Entertainment, Fantasy Flight Games, Giochi Uniti, Stratelibri

name: Conan: Brom Guest Box
description:
Brom Guest Box - a guest artist expansion for the Conan game.

Description from the publisher:

"They were characteristic Argosean sailors, short and stockily built. Conan towered above them, and no two of them could match his strength. They were hardy and robust, but his was the endurance and vitality of a wolf, his thews steeled and his nerves whetted by the hardness of his life in the world's wastelands. He was quick to laugh, quick and terrible in his wrath. He was a valiant trencherman, and strong drink was a passion and a weakness with him. Naive as a child in many ways, unfamiliar with the sophistry of civilization, he was naturally intelligent, jealous of his rights, and dangerous as a hungry tiger. Young in years, he was hardened in warfare and wandering, and his sojourns in many lands were evident in his apparel."

— Robert E. Howard, Queen of the Black Coast

This expansion lets you bring alternate versions of Conan the Barbarian and Bêlit, Queen of the Black Coast, as envisioned by the legendary Brom, to your tabletop!

The heroes come with a unique set of skills and equipment that adds more customisation and replay-ability to your games of Conan.

This version of Conan is based on the Cimmerian's days as a thief and as such he appears slightly less powerful in combat. But he does come with more toolbox abilities fitting this new role.

The version of Bêlit in the core box is that of a charismatic leader, preferring to take a backfield roll. In Brom's version however, she has eschewed this passive attitude in order to lead from the front, blades flashing as she directs her men. Ambidextrous is her new talent, replacing a more defensive one on her other incarnation. This gives her a great deal of efficiency when it comes to performing quick and precise attacks. Her command ability means that she can count on her men to cover her flanks or hold up larger groups as she deals with other targets!

Contents:
Two plastic miniatures (Conan and Bêlit), their two character sheets (one side in French, the other in English), and 12 equipment cards (six in French, six in English).
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Miniatures, Novel-based
mechanics: Action Points, Area Movement, Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Player Elimination, Variable Phase Order, Variable Player Powers

name: Linqer
description:
It is an expansion to the game Linq.

It consists of 26 new pairs of cards which add 312 new words to the base game.
This expansion also adds 8 new question mark Cards, in case that the old ones were played with very much, so you can spot, when somebody has it.

It is only playable together with Linq.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Party Game
mechanics: Pattern Recognition, Team-Based Game

name: AT-43 Army Book: Karmans
description:
From the publisher's website:

"Every warrior gets to choose between the path to victory and the path to defeat, death and life. Karman warriors always choose victory"

The Karmans, wise warriors on a quest for freedom and peace, have decided to march into battle as war spreads through the universe. They have analyzed the path taken by the cosmos and have seen its future…

In AT-43, Operation Damocles has rushed the universe on a course of war and chaos. The Karmans are fulfilling their fate by choosing to join in: They are the chosen few destined to guide the other races towards victory and wisdom!

It includes everything you need to know to play and oppose the Karmans:

Exclusive information concerning the history of the Karmans, the way their citizens live and the worlds they govern;
The army rules for the three Karman factions: Libra, Nova and Flux;
The history and rules of famous heroes: Mentor Freezer, Venerable Cornelius and Saint Armstrong;
The Karman infantry and vehicle rules;
Revelations on the Karmans spiritual quest.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Science Fiction, Wargame
mechanics: Action Points, Dice Rolling

name: Hanamikoji: Mini Expansion #5
description:
Your favorite Geishas are back with more talent and graceful performances! With the Hanamikoji action tiles expansions, you may play this award-winning 2-player game with even more tactics! These expansions contain different tiles combination. Mix and match with the previous action tiles for a more unique gaming experience!

Contains: #5 合格 "qualified"
Secret 1
Referral 2
Discard 3
Gift 4
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Force Commitment, Hand Management, I Cut, You Choose, Open Drafting

name: Thieves Den: Fortune Favors The Bold
description:
The festival has started and the gambling boat has docked at the harbor! Will you put it all on the line for a chance to win big? Roll the dice and find out!

The Thieves Den: Fortune Favors The Bold expansion adds:

5 Fortune Dice
1 Gambling Boat Tile
5 Festival Cards
10 Location Cards
7 Power Cards
6 Power Tiles
5 Score Markers
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Open Drafting, Pattern Building, Worker Placement
publishers: Daily Magic Games, Gen-X Games, Pixie Games, Schwerkraft-Verlag

name: Evolution: New World – Kickstarter Box
description:
Every ecosystem is a complex combination of living organisms and the environment. Even a small change in any element affects the entire system, but balance is usually restored quickly. However, sometimes a random event leads to the butterfly effect – an unpredictable cascade of changes that can completely transform the whole biosphere.

Evolution: New World – Kickstarter Box includes The Butterfly Effect expansion and all additional exclusive and limited content from the crowdfunding campaign.

In the box, you’ll find:

New Evolution and Area cards (including Exclusive Promo cards, alt-art cards and foil cards). Add more gameplay depth and create dynamic survival strategies for your animals.
The Solo mode. In the Alien World scenario you will fight 1 on 1 against the merciless Dominator and insatiable Devastator for supremacy or create your own monsters to compete with.
Additional tokens. With the expansion, up to 6 players can enjoy Evolution together.
Butterfly Effect scenario. Start a chain reaction of random events that affect the game’s course and change the evolutionary process.
Exclusive non-gameplay components (sticker pack, metal pin).


—description from the publisher
categories: Animals, Card Game, Educational, Environmental, Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Hand Management, Simulation
publishers: Board Game Rookie, CrowD Games, Rightgames RBG SIA

name: Thanos Rising: Avengers Infinity War – Ant-Man Promo Card
description:
Originally available at Gen Con 2019.

Ability: Once per turn, discard a bonus token to remove one damage from a hero and a counter from an Infinity Stone.
categories: Card Game, Comic Book / Strip, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Movies / TV / Radio theme
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Open Drafting

name: Runewars Miniatures Game: Death Knights – Unit Expansion
description:
Description from the publisher:

Called the Dread Horsemen by some and Doomriders by others, the Death Knights are ever at the forefront of Waiqar's army, riding from the mists to cut down the living. Donning ancient armor and aided by the speed of their terrible steeds, these mounted warriors demonstrate a skill in battle unmatched by lesser undead. The Death Knight – Unit Expansion for Runewars Miniatures Game includes four Death Knight plastic figures and two plastic cavalry movement trays, as well as five upgrade cards for army customization.
categories: Unspecified
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Cry Havoc Scenario Book 1
description:
Scenario Book 1 offers six new scenarios for the game Cry Havoc, plus rules for using lead miniatures with Cry Havoc and Siege. Each scenario defines the maps, starting positions, and victory conditions. Some of the scenarios have special rules.

The scenarios are The Knight Errant, The Foraging Party, The Knight's Lady, Reconnaissance Patrol, The Rescue, and The Battle of Little Wootton (a two part scenario).

Part of the Cry Havoc series.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Medieval, Wargame
mechanics: Hexagon Grid
publishers: Jeux Rexton, Standard Games and Publications, Ltd.

name: Trailer Park Wars! Expansion: Terror in the Trailer Park
description:
Unleash mayhem with this 2013 expansion to the base game Trailer Park Wars!
Why?
Because it’s fun. That’s why.

Add to your Trailer Park Wars Game with this frighteningly fun expansion.
Terror in the Trailer Park includes:
24 new trailers
75 Trailer Park Wars! Cards
50 Purple Yard Flamingo Miniatures (NEW Color!!)
12 Trailer Park Name Tiles

Shuffle the cards into the base game cards, name your trailer park (how about Bloody Bones Diseased Swamp?) and get ready to release a reign of terror!

New characters include: Steve the Serial Killing Carnie, the Mega-Church Pastor, Blammo the Birthday Clown as tenants along with Zombie Chihuahuas, Bunny-Crab Spider, and Flying Spider Monkeys.

New Amenities, too! Get a Bacon Vending Machine or a Kommando Kitten.

Add this expansion to your Trailer Park Wars Game for a Gut Bustin' Great Time!
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Humor, Party Game
mechanics: Modular Board, Take That

name: Bites: Promo Cards Pack
description:
Promo from the Kickstarter for Bites: New Recipes.

Includes: 2 new Special Rule cards, 1 new Chocolate rule card, 3 bubblegum tokens, and a rainbow ant.
categories: Animals, Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Commodity Speculation, End Game Bonuses, Map Reduction, Modular Board, Set Collection, Track Movement, Variable Set-up

name: Redwood: Big Box
description:
Exclusive Kickstarter Big Box with the exclusive Redwood Miniature that is only available in the Big Box.

Contains the Base game and all expansions.
Extras:
- Big Box with plastic inserts
- Bonus Constraint cards
- Exclusive Redwood Miniature Add-on: adds a possibility to get extra VP during the game, when moving over the tree base.
categories: Animals, Environmental, Exploration
mechanics: Line of Sight, Movement Template, Set Collection

name: Railroad Ink: Promo Board #2 – Red Train
description:
Promo board with a red train and the Essen Spiel logo, containing art elements of the blue and red editions. Can be used for a 7th player, or for a 13th player when combining the red and blue edition.

Contrary to Promo Board #1, this board cannot be used to join the artworks from both editions to create one huge illustration.

Was contained in Spielbox magazine #5 (2018).
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Trains
mechanics: Network and Route Building, Paper-and-Pencil
publishers: Horrible Guild, W. Nostheide Verlag GmbH

name: Clash of Rage: The Heirs of Kkran
description:
After being forced to mine crystal deposits as slaves to the Elves, the heirs of Emperor Kkran have just broken their shackles. These people, powerful when united, are now determined to regain their greatness from a time in which Kkran, the hero of ancient legends, reigned and ruled with an iron fist.

Additional clan. This is an expansion, it requires the base game Clash of Rage to be used. Allows you to play skirmish games up to 5 players, or to swap with an existing clan for campaign mode and solo mode.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Modular Board, Pattern Building, Take That

name: D6: It Takes A Village
description:
Grow Your Village... with this expansion to D6.
Now you can have three more classes to choose from. DO you need a card? Draw it from one of the three handy-dandy card carts. Did you slay a monster? Collect your two coins from the Village coin tray. Want to raise your stats? Now you can drink from the actual Fountain of You.
A glorious hunter deserves a glorious Village!

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Open Drafting

name: Galaxy Defenders: 5th Column
description: This expansion was released during the second Galaxy Defenders campaign on Kickstarter. It includes 2 agents and 2 new power armors to use with the base game or expansions.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fighting, Miniatures, Science Fiction
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game – Where Loyalty Lies
description:
Game description from the publisher:

The "A Tale of Champions" cycle of Chapter Packs for A Game of Thrones: The Card Game places a strong emphasis on the unique knights, lords, and ladies who would be at the forefront of the tourney environment. Where Loyalty Lies continues this focus with the introduction of 12 bold, new unique characters, including all-new characters and new versions of existing characters. Players will find more support for the cycle's exciting new Joust and Melee keywords, which are certain to lead to all manner of new deck types.

With 60 new cards (three copies each of 20 different cards), Where Loyalty Lies offers players exciting new bannermen for each of the Great Houses of Westeros, though fans of House Lannister and their machinations should be particularly pleased with this new Chapter Pack.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Medieval, Negotiation, Novel-based
mechanics: Hand Management, Open Drafting, Simultaneous Action Selection, Variable Player Powers
publishers: Edge Entertainment, Fantasy Flight Games, Giochi Uniti, Stratelibri

name: Carcassonne: Bonusplättchen Spiel 2017
description:
This single-tile mini-expansion can be added to any Carcassonne game. The design, however, matches that of the New Edition of Carcassonne (2014).
This promo was given out (for free) when making a purchase at the Hans im Glück booth at Spiel 2017, Essen.
categories: City Building, Expansion for Base-game, Medieval
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Tile Placement

name: Rolling Realms: Roll Player Promo Pack
description:
Expand your copy of Rolling Realms with this set of 6 promo cards, inspired by Roll Player.

To play this realm, you use dice to shift your alignment to lawful, good, chaotic, and evil. For every new aspect of your alignment, you earn rewards. Discover all aspects to complete this realm.

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Ancient Battles Deluxe Expansion Kit 1: Elephants at War
description:
From the far reaches in Africa and Asia, ancient armies would mount a howdah on the back of a mighty pachyderm and transform it into a War Elephant! How will Alexander meet this new threat when invading India and meeting King Porus at the Hydaspes river? Why was Hannibal so careful to bring elephants across the treacherous passes of the Alps in the winter? Whose elephants will reign supreme when they clash at Raphia?
Find out in the first Expansion Pack for Ancient Battles Deluxe: Elephants at War.
categories: Ancient, Expansion for Base-game, Wargame
mechanics: Hexagon Grid, Variable Phase Order

name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple – Queenie 13: Map
description:
Queenie 13 for Escape. 1 new chamber.

New chamber “Map”

Once discovered, a player inside the map chamber can roll 2 torch symbols to place his adventurer in any other already discovered chamber of his choice.
categories: Adventure, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Exploration, Real-time
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Modular Board, Push Your Luck, Roll / Spin and Move, Tile Placement

name: Empires in America: Expansion Kit
description:
From the web site:

The Empires in America Expansion Kit includes the latest errata and plenty of new Optional Rules for the struggle for a continent in North America. Among its 24 additional cards are two additional French and two additional British Leaders, and plenty of new Action, Provincials, British and World Event cards to make the game's narrative much more compelling.

Optional Rules include: Fortress Garrisons, Leader Morale, Governing, and The Royal Navy. A special historical notes section includes Standing Orders: Rodgers' Rangers, and a commentary on those famous Standing Orders.

Game Components:


One instructions sheet with new Optional Rules and Historical Notes
Twenty-four new cards
categories: Age of Reason, Expansion for Base-game, Wargame
mechanics: Action Points, Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Dice Rolling, Point to Point Movement, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Good Cop Bad Cop: Equipment Pack #1 – Protect
description:
These 5 equipment cards were given to temporarily exclusive to backers of the Good Cop Bad Cop: Bombers and Traitors Kickstarter campaign. The pieces of equipment are:
- Bribe
- Bulletproof Vest
- Confiscation Order
- Database Access
- Wire

Rereleased in 2024 with the Deliriant Promo as part of the Good Cop Bad Cop 4th edition kickstarter.
categories: Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Shadows of Brimstone: The Sacred Mountains Game Supplement
description:
Description from the publisher:

The misty valleys of the Sacred Mountains hold many secrets. It is a place of myth and legend, where fantastic creatures roam, and vast hoards of wealth and knowledge are held within the abandoned temples and mountain strongholds built into the rock. Now dragons circle the highest peaks, crumbling the stone towers and jagged spires with their sweeping tails. Many have ventured into the mountains in search of ancient treasures and mystic knowledge… most have never returned.

This 15-card Game Supplement for Forbidden Fortress introduces an all new Adventure Card – The Sacred Mountains, as well as a host of exciting new Gear, Artifacts, and Encounters themed for exploring this dangerous but rewarding region. With the new Adventure Card, any Mission can be played in the misty and magical Sacred Mountains, among the temples and strongholds built high into the peaks. This adds extra Danger as well as extra rewards to your Adventure!

CONTENTS

Card #396 The Sacred Mountains (Adventure Card)
Card #397 Traveler's Pack ×2 (Gear)
Card #398 Walking Stick (Gear)
Card #399 Water Flask (Gear)
Card #400 Meteoric Shard ×2 (Forbidden Fortress Artifact)
Card #401 Divine Tea Pot (Forbidden Fortress Artifact)
Card #402 Amulet of Khan-to (Forbidden Fortress Artifact)
Card #403 Rock Slide (Forbidden Fortress Encounter)
Card #404 Breathtaking View (Forbidden Fortress Encounter)
Card #405 Meteoric Fragment (Forbidden Fortress Encounter)
Card #406 Ancestral Spirit (Forbidden Fortress Encounter)
Card #407 Close to the Source (Forbidden Fortress Encounter)
Card #408 Call of the Dragon (Forbidden Fortress Encounter)
categories: Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Grid Movement, Modular Board

name: Good Cop Bad Cop: Equipment Pack #2 – Serve
description:
Add 7 more equipment cards to your game of Good Cop Bad Cop! This includes:

Ambulance (4+): Use immediately after a player is eliminated. They are not eliminated, and you may take any Equipment from their hand.
Helicopter (4+): Place this card face-up in front of another player. That player may view two Integrity cards when investigating. This card is discarded if the player takes any action other than Investigate on their turn.
Partner's Gun (4+): Use when a player holding a gun is shot. Take that player's gun without revealing an Integrity card. You may not use this if you are already holding a gun.
Remote Trigger (4+): Place this card in front of another player on their turn. At the beginning of their next turn, they must shoot a gun held by any player. The gun is dropped and Remote Trigger is discarded. This does not count as their action for the turn.
Scalpel (4+): Use when a player takes a Wounded token. The wounded player may immediately take the Arm action.
Scope (4+): Investigate all players being targeted by a gun
Tear Gas (6+): Choose three players. Shuffle together all face-down Integrity cards held by those players, then deal them back to those players until each player has the same number of face-down Integrity cards they previously had.
categories: Card Game, Deduction, Expansion for Base-game, Party Game
mechanics: Hand Management, Memory, Player Elimination, Take That, Team-Based Game

name: Viral: Con Mutation Promo Card
description:
This card allows players to do 3 actions:


Shield one of their viruses or trigger a crisis on an organ displayed in their zone card
Infect any organ on their zone card or absorb any other viruses on an organ displayed in their zone card
Attract or repel any other viruses any other viruses on an organ displayed in their zone card OR move their viruses from one organ to another
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Humor, Medical
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Area Movement, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Simultaneous Action Selection
publishers: Arcane Wonders, Corax Games, Edge Entertainment, Ediciones MasQueOca, MEBO Games

name: Nusfjord: The Forgotten
description:
4 new elder cards - The Old Man, Castaway, Freed Willy, Fish Trader.

Cut out the 4 elders and rafts along their edges. Shuffle the 4 new elders and place them face up in a pile next to the supply board.

4 neue Ältes­te-Kar­ten für das Spiel Nusfjord zum Ausschneiden.
categories: Economic, Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Worker Placement

name: Great War At Sea: Great White Fleet
description:
Great White Fleet - A Great War At Sea scenario book.



=First Edition, 2002:

Twenty operational scenarios feature the battleships and armored cruisers of the pre-dreadnought era. Most are based on actual war plans, including the Russian Admiralty's 1903 wargame that decided the Tsar on war with Japan. Also includes Karl Laskas' variant tactical rules for pre-dreadnoughts. An additional paper map extends the "U.S. Navy Plan Orange" map southward allowing players to explore American war plans onvolving the island of Mindanao and its anchorages.

Ownership of GWAS series games 1898: The Spanish-American War, 1904-1905: The Russo-Japanese War, Volume 1: Mediterranean, Volume 2: The North & Baltic Seas, U.S. Navy Plan Orange and U.S. Navy Plan Black is required to play all the scenarios.



=Second Edition, 2009:

Front cover is the same as First Edition. The back cover is incorrect: this edition does NOT include Karl Laskas' pre-dreadnought 1000 m scale rules.

Seven battle and twenty-five operational scenarios depict war plans involving the Great White Fleet and conflicts it might have become involved in on its 1907-1908 voyage, had diplomatic clashes at the time become violent. Conflicts centered on the Venezuela Crises of 1902 and 1908, and US concerns over the defense of the Philippines in the early 1900's, are also included.

Maps and pieces from the GWAS series games 1898: The Spanish-American War (or Remember the Maine), 1904-1905: The Russo-Japanese War (or Russo-Japanese War), Mediterranean, Jutland, Cruiser Warfare, Cone of Fire, U.S. Navy Plan Red and Black Waters, as well as the maps from U.S. Navy Plan Gold or Remember the Maine, and U.S. Navy Plan Orange or South China Sea, are required to play all the scenarios.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Nautical, Wargame
mechanics: Hexagon Grid

name: Bears vs Babies: NSFW Expansion Pack
description: Bears vs Babies: NSFW Booster Pack includes non-kid friendly cards for use in the Bears vs Babies base game.
categories: Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Zombies!!! Deadtime Stories
description:
The zombie apocalypse creeps across the world like a cancer, gutting cities and driving survivors to find refuge beyond areas of previously dense population. This struggle is seen everywhere, but it's not the whole story... Who are these survivors, and why do they fight to survive?

Zombies!!!: Deadtime Stories is a collection of storyline scenarios for the award-winning Zombies!!! board game. Players can take on specific roles, each with their own special quirks and abilities, and they strive to accomplish things beyond just getting out of the area alive. They gain experience over time, growing as heroes of the post-human world.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Exploration, Fighting, Horror, Miniatures, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Zombies
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Hand Management, Modular Board, Roll / Spin and Move

name: Tsukuyumi: Full Moon Down – Leadership Cards
description:
What's a faction without a strong leader? The leadership deck features three completely different leader cards for each faction that completely change the way you play your favorite faction.

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Mythology, Science Fiction
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Modular Board, Open Drafting, Variable Phase Order

name: Aventuria: Nedime, The Caliph's Daughter
description:
Sultan Hasrabal ben Yakuban, also known as the Wind King, Magic Sultan and Master of the Six Elements, has kidnapped Nedime, the daughter of the Caliph. Many brave heroes have already tried to free her, but none of them has ever been seen again!
Will you be able to stand up to djinn, mythical creatures and other strange creatures of the Tulamidian Nights and free Nedime?

Nedime, die Tochter des Kalifen, is a solo adventure for Aventuria - The Adventure Card Game. Assemble the Sultan's palace from a total of 60 large-sized tarot cards and send your hero night after night to explore the rooms of the palace and listen to the stories of its mysterious inhabitants! Your goal is to free the caliph's daughter Nedime, but until then, you must overcome numerous enemies and discover secrets.
One thing is certain: it will take many nights and many palace explorations to reach your goal!
This adventure was deliberately designed for a single hero and contains numerous game mechanics to make the solo game entertaining and full of diversion, but can be mastered by entire groups of heroes. A large-format palace map, Hasrabal cards, history cards, fate cards, heart cards and many other game elements ensure that every new advance into the Sultan's Palace is exciting and challenging and you never know exactly what you will be up against next time.

—description from the publisher (translated)
categories: Adventure, Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game

name: Dust Tactics: Laser Sturmgrenadiere Squad – "Laser Grenadiers"
description:
New expansion boxes for Dust Tactics will take your game to the next level! Featuring new tactical options for your Allied and Axis armies, these primed, unpainted miniatures will expand and enhance your existing forces.

The Axis’ Laser Grenadiers stand ready to reduce enemy armored units to piles of twisted metal. With their ability to hit from a distance with lasers that can cut through almost any type of armor, Laser Grenadiers can tear apart even the toughest foes.

These Grenadiers represent a brand new generation of Axis soldiers. Composed of veterans with invaluable experience, these units appear terrifying in their unique body armor. They are renowned for their advanced firearms training and solid engineering abilities, which make them an asset to any Axis army.

Bring these new troops to the battlefield and decide the fate of the world!

(Publisher's Website)
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Science Fiction, World War II
mechanics: Action Points, Dice Rolling, Modular Board

name: Star Wars: Legion – Count Dooku Commander Expansion
description:
While much of the galaxy knows him as the Separatist Alliance's Head of State, Count Dooku serves a more sinister purpose in the Clone Wars. Actually a powerful Sith lord, Dooku works behind the scenes to bring down the Jedi and destroy the Republic once and for all. As the rare Separatist unit powerful in the Force, he takes to the battles of the Clone Wars ready to show off his skills to any bold enough to challenge him.

Within the Count Dooku Commander Expansion, you'll find one unpainted and finely detailed Count Dooku miniature challenging all comers with his lightsaber. Additionally, four upgrade cards let you explore the depths of Dooku's Force powers, while three command cards invite you to make him a central piece of your army's strategy.

Unleash the power of the dark side on your enemies with the highly detailed Count Dooku miniature in this expansion pack, depicted menacing all challengers with his lightsaber at the ready.

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Science Fiction, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Variable Player Powers

name: Marvel Dice Masters: Kree Invasion Team Pack
description: The Marvel Dice Masters: Kree Invasion Team Pack has characters from the Kree Empire as well as Guardians of the Galaxy characters, including Drax, the Supreme Intelligence, and Kree Soldiers. Team Packs each include 24 cards and 16 dice, representing eight different characters, and can be combined with any Dice Masters boxed set.
categories: Collectible Components, Comic Book / Strip, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Fighting
mechanics: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Dice Rolling, Variable Player Powers

name: Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game – The Mark of Madness
description:
Description from the publisher:

"There is a whole secret cult of evil men (a man of your mystical erudition will understand me when I link them with Hastur and the Yellow Sign)…"
–H.P. Lovecraft, The Whisperer in Darkness

The Mark of Madness is the tenth deluxe expansion for Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game, introducing 165 new cards (three copies each of 55 different cards) that explore those depths of insanity that lie near the core of the Lovecraftian mythos. Devoted primarily to the Hastur faction, The Mark of Madness introduces a great number of deranged Artists, Cultists, and Lunatics, as well as the terrible, ancient powers that spur them forward. As Hastur's secret cult expands its powers, you'll also find a maddening array of new characters, support cards, conspiracies, and events, most of which lend new strength to the game's Terror struggle and mechanics for insanity.

Additionally, as Hastur's madness reaches outward to all of the game's eight factions, each gains a powerful new character that enters play insane and reshapes the game when it is restored. It's unknown whether or not these new characters will be able to prevent Hastur's followers from plunging the world into a new age of terror and chaos, but they gain additional support from other characters, events, and support cards.
categories: Card Game, Horror, Novel-based
mechanics: Hand Management

name: Tortuga 2199: Kickstarter Edition
description:
Kickstarter edition contains:

Tortuga 2199
Shipwreck Bay expansion
Exclusive Player Markers
2 Exclusive Ships
6 Exclusive Status Cards
categories: Pirates, Space Exploration
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building
publishers: Grey Fox Games, Lavka Games, Lotus Frog Games, Schwerkraft-Verlag

name: Islebound: Deep Fog
description:
A mysterious creature has risen from the deep, shrouding the archipelago in a thick, mysterious fog. Navigate your way through the treacherous mists, building your strength and increasing your influence, until you can finally defeat the monster. Or perhaps politely ask it to go away?

Deep Fog is a bonus scenario for Islebound, which includes one 2-sided card and an instruction sheet. As the rules explain succinctly, "With Deep Fog, players navigate through a rotating stack of sea boards instead of laying them out in a fixed map. The game ends when a player is able to defeat the fog monster, either through military prowess or diplomacy."
categories: Nautical
mechanics: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Open Drafting, Worker Placement

name: Eaten By Zombies!: Weapons of Mass Destruction
description:
The Eaten By Zombies!: Weapons of Mass Destruction mini-expansion consists of five sets of swag cards which were unlocked during the Kickstarter funding of Eaten By Zombies!: In Cahoots. These cards all help kill zombies, which is a change from swag cards in Eaten By Zombies!: In Cahoots, which mostly assisted in fleeing from zombies. These new cards may prove the difference when trying to survive from the zombie hordes and win the game.

Eaten By Zombies!: Weapons of Mass Destruction includes five copies each of:


Pineapple
Double Barrel Boomstick
Flame Thrower
Six Shooters
Molotov Cocktail
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Horror, Zombies
mechanics: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Open Drafting

name: Clockwork Wars: Academy & Volcano Bonus Tiles
description:
The first of two bonus tilesets created for the Clockwork Wars Kickstarter. This expansion consists of four new tiles:


Two Academy tiles, which are used to generate additional workers.
Two Volcano tiles, which erupt and cause chaos and destruction.


Also included is a double-sided reference card (thick cardboard stock) with all necessary rules.
categories: Civilization, Fantasy, Territory Building, Wargame
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Modular Board, Secret Unit Deployment, Variable Player Powers, Worker Placement

name: Clockwork Wars: Gulag & Dynamo Bonus Tiles
description:
The second of two bonus tilesets created for the Clockwork Wars Kickstarter. This expansion consists of four new tiles:


Two Gulag tiles, which are used to capture and remove enemy soldiers.
Two Dynamo tiles, which provide potent scoring opportunities.


Also included is a double-sided reference card (thick cardboard stock) with all necessary rules.
categories: Civilization, Fantasy, Territory Building, Wargame
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Modular Board, Secret Unit Deployment, Variable Player Powers, Worker Placement

name: Nations at War: White Star Rising – Operation Cobra
description:
On July 25th, 1944 the American, British, Canadian, Free French and Polish Armies launched an offensive to eliminate the deadlock in the Norman peninsula, and launch the Allied Armies into the interior of France. The German Army, over-committed and under-equipped, was soundly defeated; thousands of its troops, in addition to much of their equipment, were captured in the Falaise pocket. In short, the offensive worked, but that doesn't do justice to the blood spilled and courage shown during the six-week battle. As with any battle, the whole is made up of an uncountable number of skirmishes, clashes and firefights. Fourteen such events make up the scenarios of White Star Rising: Operation Cobra.

White Star Rising: Operation Cobra is an expansion for the game White Star Rising in the Nations at War series. This expansion focuses on the events surrounding the Allied breakout from the Normandy beachhead in July-August 1944. Operation Cobra adds the Canadians, the Free French and the Free Polish to the Nations at War series in addition to new units for the Americans, the British, and the Germans.

White Star Rising: Operation Cobra comes with nine stand-alone scenarios, focusing on events near Falaise, as the Germans tried to escape the converging allied armies. Among the topics are the Polish stand on Mont Ormel Ridge and Canadian efforts to capture the village of St. Lambert-sur-Dives. Operation Cobra also contains a five scenario linked campaign following the breakout of American armored units during Operation Cobra near the end of July 1944.

Components:
126 Counters
Nine Scenarios
One Campaign

White Star Rising: Operation Cobra is not a stand-alone game, you will need White Star Rising first or second edition to play it.

Expands Nations at War: White Star Rising

Other Games in Series:

Nations at War: Desert Heat
Nations at War: Stalin's Triumph
Nations at War: White Star Rising – Airborne
Nations at War: White Star Rising – Operation Cobra
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Chit-Pull System, Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid, Simulation

name: Warhammer (Sixth Edition): The General's Compendium
description: An optional rules supplement for Warhammer 6th edition with a focus on campaigns. Included are rules for running several different kinds of campaigns (including map-based and decision trees), plus rules for special locations and environments and a number of scenarios to run during campaigns.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Miniatures, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Modular Board, Variable Player Powers

name: La Fallera Calavera 3: més enllà de la paella
description:
La Fallera Calavera has proclaimed itself queen and has become a tyrant. The zombie walks through the Kingdom of La Fallera Calavera and forces her slaves to feed her. But the zombie is no longer satisfied with only paella: now she also wants the typical foods of each area!

La Fallera Calavera 3 is the second expansion of the card game La Fallera Calavera, specially well-known in the Valencian Country. This expansion includes 55 new cards and, for the first time in the series, a game board.

The board represents the map of the Kingdom of Fallera Calavera on which a pawn of La Fallera will move. In each turn, players will be able to move the Queen. This will help them to: draft cards from the board, turn on effects of some cards and change the final victory conditions of the game.

—description from the designer
categories: Bluffing, Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fighting, Humor, Zombies
mechanics: Hand Management, Open Drafting, Set Collection, Take That

name: Go Nuts for Donuts: Bacon
description:
Go Nuts for Donuts: Bacon is a Kickstarter Limited Exclusive promo card for use with Go Nuts for Donuts because who doesn't want to add bacon to their doughnuts?!

This is a blue card for use with 5+ players. It grants 1 point "for each maple bar or maple frosted card."
categories: Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Progress: Industrial Revolution
description:
Progress: Industrial Revolution is an expansion for the base game of Progress: Evolution of Technology. It consists of 55 Age IV cards.

The Industrial Revolution expansion depicts the major technologies developments in the area of Culture, Engineering and Science in the period of the first industrial revolution, from the end of the Renaissance to days of the first World War.
categories: Card Game, Civilization, Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Action Points, Hand Management

name: Age of Steam Expansion: Argentina / The French Riviera
description:
Age of Steam Expansion: Argentina / The French Riviera is a new pair of expansions for use with Age of Steam. Each new map in this expansion includes a new type of hex, with Argentina featuring the pampas and The French Riviera showcasing the expensive French coast.

Both maps are illustrated by the talented Todd Sanders, who added flavor to them, namely the Dictatorship and Saul Bass film posters.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Trains
mechanics: Network and Route Building

name: Supremacy: Boomers – Ballistic Missile Subs
description:
The Boomers expansion set allows players to add ballistic missile subs to their navies. Players must pay $2 Billion dollars and lose one grain, one oil, and four minerals units from their supply center to build each sub. Each sub carries two missiles and can be used for conventional or strategic attacks. The rules contain specific info for offensive and defensive tactics.
The expansion set contains 40 color-coded miniature subs, five per-superpower.

Expands:

Supremacy: The Game of the Superpowers


Expanded by:

Supremacy: Boomers – Warlords and Pirates Blister Pack
categories: Economic, Expansion for Base-game, Modern Warfare, Negotiation, Political, Wargame
mechanics: Action Points, Campaign / Battle Card Driven

name: Star Fleet Battles: Commander's SSD Book #1
description:
An expansion for the Star Fleet Battles: Commander's Rulebook.

Contains 48 SSD (Ship System Display) sheets for Star Fleet Battles. 15-Kzinti, 7-Orion, 4-Andromedan (7 ships) and 22-Federation SSD's.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid, Simulation
publishers: Amarillo Design Bureau, Inc., Task Force Games

name: Carcassonne: Bonusplättchen Spiel 2018
description:
This single-tile mini-expansion can be added to any Carcassonne game. The design, however, matches that of the New Edition of Carcassonne (2014).

This promo was given out at Spiel 2018, Essen.
categories: City Building, Expansion for Base-game, Medieval, Territory Building
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Tile Placement

name: Arcadia Quest: Pets – Chuck
description:
Level 1
Armor: 0
Health: 2
Ability: May store up to 3 unused non-CRIT rolled by close owners (lost if Chuck dies). Close Owners may move these stored results to their rolls.

Promotional figure offered by The Dice Tower
categories: Adventure, Fantasy, Fighting, Miniatures
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Modular Board, Variable Player Powers

name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game – Valar Morghulis
description:
Game description from the publisher:

Valar Morghulis, the first Chapter Pack in the "Beyond the Narrow Sea" cycle for A Game of Thrones: The Card Game, transports players to the massive and diverse Eastern continent of Essos with characters, locations, and events drawn from George R.R. Martin's A Feast for Crows and A Dance with Dragons. Players gain fantastic options for exciting new strategies, including versatile decks that start without agendas.

New locations reduce the "out of House" gold penalties for characters, making thematic Trait-based decks more viable than ever, and new River plots build upon each other to create interesting and increasingly powerful strategic options. Beginning a cycle intended to welcome new players while providing veterans with exciting challenges, Valar Morghulis is an excellent second purchase for players looking to expand upon the Core Set!
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Medieval, Negotiation, Novel-based
mechanics: Hand Management, Open Drafting, Simultaneous Action Selection, Variable Player Powers
publishers: Edge Entertainment, Fantasy Flight Games, Giochi Uniti, Stratelibri

name: Starlight Stage
description:
Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to this wonderful description page! We plan to put on a really exciting show for you today! Are you ready for these girls to show you what they've got?! Here it is, the moment you've all been waiting for — it's STARLIGHT STAGE!

Starlight Stage is a fast-paced set-collecting card game in which you are playing a talent manager whose aim is to get the best talent of all your rival agencies. You start with the fresh talent of a model, an actress, and a singer. You help to build their careers by collecting lessons, events, and upgrades for them which earns them more fame. The manager with the most famous talent at the end of the game wins!

You start the game with three separate decks in a vertical row: the Idol deck, Fame deck, and Event deck. From the top of each deck, you draw a card for each player and lay them in a row next to the deck from which they were drawn. Each player starts with the beginning hand of new talent: the actress, model, and singer. To start the game, the first player has the option of drawing a card from one of the three stacks and adding it to the end of the row, increasing their options of what to purchase. They then use their accumulated talent points to either purchase an assignment card, acquire a fame card, or take a lesson. Play continues until the fame deck is empty. Then all players tally their fame points and whoever has the most points wins!

The English-language edition of Starlight Stage includes both the original Japanese base game as well as the fourteen cards of Starlight Stage: Expansion Card Set 1.
categories: Card Game
mechanics: Hand Management, Open Drafting, Set Collection
publishers: Japanime Games, シュレディンガーゲームズ (Schrodinger Games)

name: 8Bit Box: Double Rumble
description: 8Bit Box: Double Rumble, an expansion for the 8Bit Box simulation kit, is reminiscent of fighting arcade games of old. Players need to confront the bad guys facing them, either in a solitaire game or playing co-operatively with one other player, in order to defeat the boss at the final stage of the game.

Characters are also interchangeable and can be swapped out to create different teams and add more variety to your game.

name: Munchkin 3.5: Clerical Errata
description:
The original print run of Munchkin 3: Clerical Errors was misprinted. Treasure cards wound up in the Door deck. So in true Munchkinly fashion, Steve Jackson Games created rules to actually use these misprinted cards, packaged up 1200 copies, and sold them direct through their online store.

Clerical Errata consists of one misprinted 56-card deck from the 112-card Munchkin 3: Clerical Errors set. The deck contains 18 treasure cards, 10 door cards, and 28 misprinted treasure cards with door backs.

Part of the Munchkin series
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Humor

name: Legend of the Five Rings: The Card Game – Justice for Satsume
description:
All eyes are on Otoson Uchi as the Hantei family line has been shaken like never before. While the Imperial City is the focal point for these dramatic events, strife infests Rokugan from all angles. The Emerald Empire breaks down in chaos — who will you support?

Step into the world of Rokugan with Justice for Satsume, the third Dynasty Pack in the "Inheritance" cycle for Legend of the Five Rings: The Card Game! Justice for Satsume continues the themes of the "Inheritance" cycle, placing an emphasis on Courtiers and Bushi, introducing two new disguised characters ideal for surprising your opponent, and two Clan Champions!

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Collectible Components, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy
mechanics: Action Points, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Secret Unit Deployment, Variable Player Powers

name: The Walking Dead: All Out War – Morgan Game Booster
description:
Morgan Jones and his son Duane were Rick's first human contact after he returned home. What Rick found was Duane's shovel! Morgan and Duane then accompanied Rick to the Cynthiana Police Dept. where they were outfitted with rifles and bullets.

This booster pack contains 3 Unique, collectible miniatures allowing you to add Morgan and Duane to your games, along with an extra Walker to bulk out your herd.

Requires The Walking Dead: All Out War Miniatures Game Core set to play.

Contents
1 Morgan Miniature
1 Duane Miniature
1 Walker Miniature
2 Character Cards
4 Equipment Cards
1 Mantic Point

name: Cards Against Humanity: The Bigger, Blacker Box 2
description:
The Bigger Blacker Box is a tremendous empty storage case big enough to hold all the cards we’ve ever made, with room for even more: up to 2,500 cards. If the size of this box does not impress you, nothing will.
Does not include a copy of Cards Against Humanity.
Includes 50 blank cards, the 20-card Box Expansion, and some surprises. Who knows what's in there?
No matter how big we make this box, it will never be big enough for you.

—description from the publisher

name: Heart of Crown: Fairy Garden – Advanced Play Mini Expansion
description:
Are you a Heart of Crown expert? Get to the action faster by swapping out your starting deck in this mini expansion. Compatible with all the Heart of Crown games - the base game is required (original Heart of Crown or Fairy Garden).

In the Advanced Play Mini Expansion, each player starts the game with a deck of 10 cards as listed below. Otherwise, the rules of the game are unchanged.

6 Farming Villages
1 Mansion (New)
1 Attendant (New)
1 Alternate Art Apprentice Maid
1 Personal Maid (New)

To begin the game, instead of the number of Apprentice Maids, determine who goes first by who has the highest total number of Attendants, Apprentice Maids, and Personal Maids. All four Personal Maids have the same effect.

Number of Cards Included: 16
Sleeve Size: Standard

—description from the publisher

name: Kaosball: Team – Samaria Barbarians
description:
“With our steel we will devastate the weak, corrupt and the false. “

-The Prince, coach

The Barbarians, an elite warrior team from ravaged Samaria, have declared Kaosball the last true battleground. Their resolve and intensity is magnified by pain, unlocking their savage ability and cleaves through the opposing teams like the cowards they are!

description:
3 promo cards when you buy the game at Spiel 2023 in Essen:

- 1 garden card: Gain lantern rewards
- 1 Daimyo card: Perform any action associated with a coral/black/white die in the castle on the main board

description: Expansion for The Agents. Adds 18 new agent cards to the base game.

name: Of Dreams & Shadows: The Monster Within
description:
It comes.
Across the frozen land
Wendigo approaches.
See its many faces?
Old and powerful
Words call out to me
In a whisper, a howl.
To feel its icy touch
And taste of the beyond,
Flesh shall be eaten.
Then all will be One.

- Selene

A season has passed since the Champions saved the realm. Winter has come, blanketing the land in snow and ice. The kingdoms are rebuilding, but tensions rise as food becomes scarce. The Werefolk are in decline and there are rumours of something exterminating their kind. New disappearances are happening across the realm. Some who have gone missing are later found, but turned into ravenous cannibals. The surviving Champions learn that these monsters have been created for some greater purpose.

Expansion Highlights

Continues the storyline and results of the core game
Several choices made in the core game will lead players down different story paths
Experienced versions of each Champion with updated abilities
New Villain, Foes and Epic Foes
New Resource cards such as spells that will grant more control of the map
New rules on customizing your Resource deck to fit your preferences


—description from the publisher

Admirals

Scenarios
Operational Campaign Rules
Expanded Fleet Lists
The Royal Navy
The Kriegsmarine
The United States Navy
The Imperial Japanese Navy
The Italian Navy
The French Navy
The Soviet Navy
Civilian Shipping

Victory at Sea: World War II Naval Combat Game

Warmachine: Legends brings the saga of Warmachine to an electrifying climax and provides exciting new options in the form of new warcasters, warjacks, units, solos, and epic warcasters. The book provides all new options for every faction and focuses on the characters, warjacks, and units that have attained legendary status in the world of Warmachine. name: Die Legenden von Andor: Dunkle Eara Heldentableau
description:
Dunkle Eara Heldentableau is an expansion for Die Legenden von Andor: Die letzte Hoffnung and was offered at the SPIEL '16 fair as promo material and as download from the KOSMOS website.

It contains on one side Liphardus, male dark magician from the north and on the other Eara, female dark magician from the north.

This limited edition expansion comes with its own set of seven cards.
- one rule card to explain the new ability for the dark mage.
- six legend cards adding tasks for the dark mage to legends 11-17

As a special ability this hero can turn a single thrown dice of an enemy to its opposite side once every combat round - even against end bosses.
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling

name: Sub Terra II: Typhaon Wakes
description:
In the Typhaon Wakes expansion for Sub Terra II, players are introduced to three new types of guardian to contend with in their quest to extract the mysterious artifact.

Volatile guardians that can explode and cause massive damage, ranged guardians that can attack from afar, and the eternal guardian, who will not rest until you are gone from the temple.

In addition to these new guardian types and several new tile types, players will also have access to a new one vs many mode, where one player takes the role of the spirit of the mountain, Typhaon.

This player will control the resolution of hazards at the end of explorer player turns using a light handbuilding mechanic. This gives that player control over the evil machinations of the mountain.

—description from the publisher
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Exploration, Fantasy, Horror, Maze
mechanics: Action Points, Cooperative Game, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Map Deformation, Modular Board, Network and Route Building, Pick-up and Deliver, Push Your Luck, Square Grid, Tile Placement, Variable Player Powers

name: Homebrewers: Getting Equipped
description:
Getting Equipped is a deck of 25 unique pieces of equipment, each one giving the brewer who installs it a special power. At the beginning of the game, players will draft the equipment cards, with each player selecting five that only they can chose from to install. Each player can only install four out of their five equipment cards, though. During the game, you can pay the dollar cost shown on an equipment card to install that piece of equipment in your garage. Installing the right mix of equipment and making good use of them can make all the difference in the battle for title of Best Homebrewer! Each game that you play will see you drafting and installing different equipment. With over 53,000 different combinations of 5 equipment cards that you can draft, every game you play will provide a unique challenge and strategy.

—description from the publisher
categories: Dice, Economic, Expansion for Base-game
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Set Collection, Trading

Christmas Market
Stockade
Guest House
Oktoberfest
Rebuild

description:
Just wook at da widdle evil beasties! SO CUTE!! Sure, they’re going to munch your face off, but they’re JUST SO ADORABLE!! Who could possibly complain when CuteZilla roasts them alive? It would take an outright psychopath bent on nothing but slaughter and Loot to even think about raising a blade against these PRETTY LITTLE HORRORS!! Hey… doesn’t “psychopaths bent on slaughter and Loot” describe most adventuring parties?


5 Miniatures

name: Jetpack Joyride: Deluxe Edition
description:
Jetpack Joyride is a real-time competitive puzzle game adapted from the mobile game of the same name! Players need to fly their way through a lab using the polyomino tiles over a series of three rounds, avoiding obstacles and collecting coins along the way. Whoever has the most points at the end of the third round wins!

This edition contains 3 additional expansions: Vehicle Expansion, Lucky Barry Expansion and Solo Campaign Expansion.

mechanics: Tile Placement

A combination of all the expansions included in the new Omega edition. These include Zeus' Challenge, Relics of Olympus and Tyche's Whims.

This set of expansions is offered to those who previously bought Omen, so they can get up to date with the newest edition.
